sentences: Parker Kindred is an American drummer who played in the band of Jeff Buckley, appearing on his unfinished second album,  Sketches for My Sweetheart the Drunk in 1997, as well as playing live with Buckley and the rest of his band at Arlene's Grocery on February 9, 1997.
After Buckley's death Kindred continued to work with the other band members on other projects in New York City.
However Tighe and Kindred continued to play together and later went on to form The A.M. with bassist Andrew Wyatt.
